page.title: 07CHURCHES IN GRANTOWN
page.content:
In Grantown there are four main churches:- The Inverallan Church of Scotland, the Baptist Church, St Columba's Scottish Episcopal Church and St Anne's Catholic Church.
Inverallan is on the corner of Mossie Road and Church Avenue. It has a hall on Church Avenue and old and new cemetaries just outside Grantown. The minister is Rev.Colin Alston. The Babtist Church is opposite the Community Centre on the high street. The Minister is Rev O Roberts. The Episcopal is on Woodlands Terrace. Canon Wheatley is the Minister. St Anne's Catholic Church is on Forest Road, next to the telephone exchange. The priest is Father Barry.
